content: 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around do not join 60 single_crochet rnds 9-19 continue working even in spiral single_crochet on 60 single_crochet at end of last round join with slip_stitch drop strand of one color and continue with single strand of other color begin lace pattern round 20 chain 4 double_crochet in same st at base of beg chain counts as beginning v-st skip next single_crochet *v-st in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-4 30 v-sts rnds 21-23 work beg v-st *v-st in next v-st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-4 30 v-sts round 24 chain 1 work 3 single_crochet in space of ea v-st join with slip_stitch 90 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in tails finishing insert appropriate sized container into bottom of bag 2 crochet chain ties make 2 with smaller hook and double strand color s of choice chain 100 fasten_off alternative ribbon ties cut length of ribbon in half to make 2 ties weave ties in starting at opposite ends of top of last v-st round weave ties through spaces of v-sts tie ends of ea chain or ribbon in a knot trim ends to desired length to close bag pull drawstring ties from opposite ends skein bag variation tall yellow/pink bag in photo follow medium-size bag instructions through round 5 36 single_crochet rnds 6-22 continue working even in spiral single_crochet on 36 single_crochet at end of last round join with slip_stitch drop strand of one color and continue with single strand of other color begin lace pattern round 23 chain 4 double_crochet in same st at base of beg chain counts as beginning v-st skip next single_crochet *v-st in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-4 18 v-sts rnds 24-28 work beg v-st *v-st in next v-st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 18 v-sts round 29 chain 1 work 3 single_crochet in space of ea v-st join with slip_stitch 54 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in tails follow finishing instructions as for medium-size bag above thread ball bag variation pink/white bag in photo follow medium-size bag instructions through round 5 36 single_crochet rnds 6-12 continue working even in spiral single_crochet on 36 single_crochet at end of last round join with slip_stitch drop strand of one color and continue with single strand of other color begin lace pattern round 13 chain 4 double_crochet in same st at base of beg chain counts as beginning v-st skip next single_crochet *v-st in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-4 18 v-sts rnds 14-16 work beg v-st *v-st in next v-st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 18 v-sts round 17 chain 1 work 3 single_crochet in space of ea v-st join with slip_stitch 54 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in tails follow finishing instructions
